faqs.question: What MMD model fixing options are available?
faqs.answer:
[image]https://github.com/Yusarina/Cats-Blender-Plugin-Unofficial-/assets/104736380/0d74e775-8f19-4481-8407-cd1fd098b243[/image]

[warning]IMPORTANT: Fix MMD Model should ONLY be used for new MMD/VRM models which have NOT been set up for Unity. DO NOT use this if your model has already been set up for Unity (bought from Gumroad, Booth, etc.) or if you are creating your own model.[/warning]

### Fix MMD Model Features:
- Reparents bones
- Removes unnecessary bones
- Renames and translates objects/bones
- Mixes weight paints
- Rotates hips
- Removes bone constraints
- Deletes unused vertex groups

### Additional Tools:
- Fix Materials: Applies VRChat-related fixes
- Combine Materials: Reduces draw calls
- Remove Rigid Bodies and Joints: Removes physics not used in VRChat
